item.title: Supervision
item.description: PhD Students Watheq Mansour (primary advisor, current): Efficient and Effective Data Augmentation Strategies for Information Retrieval. Dr Shengyao Zhuang (secondary advisor, graduated 2023): Teaching Pre-Trained Language Models to Rank Effectively, Efficiently, and Robustly. Masters Students Tharita Tipdecho (secondary advisor): TBA. Honours Students Zhixuan Li (graduated 2024): Exploring Batch Query Processing for Web Search. Charlotte Pietsch (current): Revisiting Impact-Based Index Structures for Efficient Ranking.
